properties.areaDesc: South Central Oregon Coast; Curry County Coast
properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 20 at 1:41PM PST until January 21 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Large breaking waves of 20 to 23 feet.

* WHERE...South Central Oregon Coast and Curry County Coast from
near Brookings northward.

* WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Large breaking waves will create hazardous
conditions along and within the surf zone, and could inundate
beaches and low lying shorelines. Beach erosion is possible,
and exposed infrastructure may be damaged.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Stay away from the surf zone and off of jetties. Area beaches may
become hazardous due to dangerous surf conditions.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY
